ygData.subject: Re: Fletching
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Evil races cannot fletch without help, and yes, it sucks.  I dumped 20 points into fletching without realizing that I couldn t do it without help.  You can
ygData.messageBody:
>Checked this out. You mean the group of three....one sells blacksmithing
>molds, one sells nothing and the other sells fletching materials but only
>1/4 of what you need to make an arrow?
>The way I see it, SK can never become fletchers without making mule
>characters. Which it seems will be the way I will do it I guess.

Evil races cannot fletch without help, and yes, it sucks. I dumped 20 points into fletching without realizing that I couldn't do it without help. You can make bow by buying from the merchant in Feerrott, but it is expensive, and event at a 20 skill, your success rate is awful. Plus there is less of a market for bows than arrows and you can't really do bows in massive quantities. Luckily, I'm part of a guild, and I'm having them fetch the required components for me, backpacks full of them. Your best bet is to make friends that can do it for you, or be a human SK in Qeynos.

Scragg, Troll SK on Bristlebane
